en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 115,000 to "Momok" the Movie!
en.content: FusionExcel is proud to sponsor RM 115,000 (Quantum Science products) as contest prizes for the movie " Momok" which will be shown in cinemas in Malaysia over the Hari Raya Holidays. Receiving the mock cheque from FusionExcel's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee is director/ producer M Jamil together with his wife Siti Rohani, a former Miss Malaysia, who is also a guest star in the movie. Witnessing the mock cheque presentation is former Miss Malaysia and now FE's Ambassador for "Hope For Children" Maggie Loo.

meta.description: prizes for the movie " Momok" which will be shown in cinemas in Malaysia over the Hari Raya.

meta.author: klhunter
